text: Nuko (uwo mugore) yumvise ibyo bamuvugaho, arabatumira anabategurira ibyo begamaho, anaha buri wese muri bo icyuma (cyo gukata ibiribwa), maze abwira (Yusufu) ati “Ngaho sohoka ubanyure imbere.” Bamubonye baramurangarira (kubera ubwiza bwe) maze bitemagura intoki, baravuga bati “Allah abiturinde! Uyu si ikiremwa muntu! Ahubwo ni malayika mutagatifu!”
